item.title: Les Choses en Face
item.description:
Les Choses en Face

Een intrigerend verhaal over twee mannen, waarvan de eerste zijn buitenlandse familie probeert bijeen te krijgen en te herenigen, terwijl de andere op zoek is naar de enige persoon die het leven van zijn vrouw had kunnen redden.

item.title: Go Into The Story | The craft of screenwriting, movies, Hollywood, and the creative life
item.description:
Go Into The Story | The craft of screenwriting, movies, Hollywood, and the creative life

Reading scripts. Absolutely critical to learn the craft of screenwriting. The focus of this weekly series is a deep structural and thematic analysis of each script we read. Our daily schedule: Monday: Scene-By-Scene Breakdown Tuesday: Plot Wednesday: Characters Thursday: Themes Friday: Dialogue Saturday: Takeaways Today: Scene-By-Scene Breakdown.

item.title: 'House of Cards' DP Reveals the Camera & Lighting Techniques of the Popular Netflix Series
item.description:
'House of Cards' DP Reveals the Camera & Lighting Techniques of the Popular Netflix Series

Television cinematography has come quite a ways in the past 10 years. In the arena of episodic television, where multi-camera shoots with high-key lighting were once the norm, incredibly cinematic single-camera cinematography has now taken hold.

item.title: How Alfred Hitchcock Blocks A Scene
item.description:
How Alfred Hitchcock Blocks A Scene

The Nerdwriter breaks down a scene from Hitchcock's Vertigo to look for story clues in the blocking. I'm always troubled by these kinds of "readings" of movie scenes for two big reasons: (1) it assumes that Alfred Hitchcock was entirely responsible for the blocking and (2) that only Alfred Hitchcock is capable of that kind of blocking.

item.title: #32 - MAX LANDIS - Screenwriter/Director AMERICAN ULTRA - VICTOR FRANKENSTEIN - CHRONICLE - ME HIM HER - ARIANA GRANDE MUSIC VIDEO
item.description:
#32 - MAX LANDIS - Screenwriter/Director AMERICAN ULTRA - VICTOR FRANKENSTEIN - CHRONICLE - ME HIM HER - ARIANA GRANDE MUSIC VIDEO

A conversation with screenwriter and director Max Landis. We discuss his writing process, presenting a pitch, directing the new Ariana Grande music video One Last Time, directing his first feature film Me Him Her, and his short film Jane LA featured on Max...
